item.title: Docs: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Cloud service provider related faults

Amazon AWS

  1. Failed to obtain AWS credentials, the log shows getting credentials: exec: executable aws failed with exit code 253.

    The main reason: Use the aws command to obtain credentials when accessing EKS Kubernetes in AWS. aws is not installed by default in Cluster Optimizer. It obtains credentials through the API. Because it involves automatically refreshing kubeconfig, you need to edit the cluster and select Automatically refresh Kubeconfig.
